mapper.select: SELECT p.id, p.title, p.content, p.author, p.subject, p.category_id, p.created_at, p.updated_at, c.name AS category_name FROM board_posts p LEFT JOIN board_categories c ON p.category_id = c.id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board_posts (title, content, author, subject, category_id) VALUES (#{title}, #{content}, #{author}, #{subject}, #{categoryId})
mapper.select: select count(*) from board_posts WHERE category_id = #{categoryId}
